ratings.comment: I asked a question in discussion and instead of answering it I was told to think intuitively. Only one person knew what was going on the entire time and everyone else was getting cold called to answer questions they didnt know how to solve.
Duzhe tried really hard to make a hard class reasonable to students, especially for those who never had stat before. Great professor overall.

A nice professor for sure, seems like he really cared about us as a whole. Lectures weren't to my taste (pacing and too quiet), but the lecture slides he posts are very thorough and have all of the information there. There was extra credit questions given in lecture, and at the end of the semester, there was a 5% overall grade bump for everyone.
Nice guy... but not really a taught course. If you took stats in high school you definitely should do well. If not.. good luck

Professor Wang gives lectures at a pretty quick pace but luckily his lectures are available online. Homework assignments given were all very reasonable and no textbook readings ensured the class was not a huge time commitment. Professor Wang give's great review lectures for assessments which will not want to be skipped!
Peter is definitely very cute, we all like him for his kindness and knowledge. He loves statistics very much.
Peter is great! He tried his best to help us!
He is super nice and you might feel difficult in this class as a student in life science, but if you work hard, it's easy to get good score.
